text: Lemooria is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1989.Short, Philip Sydney. 1989. Muelleria 7(1): 112Tropicos, Lemooria P.S. Short There is only one known species, Lemooria burkittii, endemic to Australia.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist It is found in every state except Tasmania.Atlas of Living Australia, Lemooria burkittii (Benth.) P.S.Short ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Australia Category:Taxa named by Philip Sydney Short
title: Lemooria
